root.name: The Magical Quest Starring Mickey Mouse
root.description: OverviewThe Magical Quest starring Mickey Mouse (known in Japan as Mikkī no majikaruadobenchā, translated to Mickey's Magical Adventure) is a 2D sidescrolling platformer developed and published by Capcom for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System in December 1992. A collaboration between Capcom and Disney, the game stars Mickey Mouse, who must use the power of magical costumes to rescue his dog Pluto by the evil Emperor Pete.The game is the first of a trilogy of games, titled Disney's Magical Quest, and was ported to the Game Boy Advance in 2002 (titled Disney's Magical Quest starring Mickey and Minnie Mouse). The GBA version includes a new playable character (Minnie Mouse, who sports no gameplay difference) and the ability to save games.
